snippet.title: Wild Bastards - Official Release Date Trailer | OTK Games Expo 2024
snippet.description: Meet the characters, take a peek at their weapons, and see them in action in this new trailer for Wild Bastards, an upcoming spiritual successor to Void Bastards. Wild Bastards will be available on PS5, Xbox Series X/S, Nintendo Switch, and PC on September 12, 2024. Wild Bastards is a roguelike strategy shooter with heart-pounding FPS action, mod management, and a tactical campaign. Saddle up and lead the most notorious outlaws in the galaxy.
